messages.subject: Attached My Pictures reply here
messages.body:
Praise be to Allah the merciful . He is Allah, the One and



Only, Allah and there is none like Him



Praise be to his Holy Name Amin .



Assamalakium.







Dear Fanny Plunge,



Thanks for the mail and your keen interest regarding this project , I am happy to receive your mail honestly,Allah is one and in him we all trust, My dear i prayed to Allah to provide a good person over this, before choosen you as a good person who can handle this fund deposited in SECURITY COMPANY.







i prayed to allah to provide a good trust worthy one ,then i found you to take charge of the this great project,am entrusting on you now.







You will write to me by email a promissory letter guarantee that before i pass away that you will distribute this money to the orphanage homes and poor people ,promulgating Allah's kingdom and building mosques too .







However, I will send to you a copy of the deposit document of this money and authority letter from an attorney here which will empower you to claim the consignments money soon, which will enable you stand on my behalf and make the claim.







I will also forward your contact informations to the Security Company where this money is deposited in a SECURITY and also instruct them to release the deposit consignment fund to you on my behalf as soon as you send phone and address too.







I will then send the required documents and a copy of the authorisation letter to the company for them to establish communication with you regarding the delivery.







Please note that the Boxes consignments is bonded deposited in a trunck boxes as it was deposited by my late husband as jeweries the security company ,doens't know the contents of the boxes, and you should not tell them please .







You will travel there just for 24 hours you will be there and disloged to your account,i will not like to speak with you because my late husband relatives is surrouding me which i dont want them to know about this ,because they are christians converts.







I might not be replying your mails very often except when I am free and strong because I do not want my husband's relatives to be aware of this.







Apparently this legal power of attorney letter will be process by an attorney here , which will enable you to claim the deposit consignments on my behalf , hence i will not stay to live again .







Attached is my pictures when am fine and were am in a terrible suitation. My address is 25, avenue Joseph Anoma, 12 etage 04 B.P. 815, Abidjan, Ivory Coast in West Africa .







Waiting for your urgent response.Pray for me am in pains .you can send your picture to me too if you like .







ALLAH'S blessings on you.  i wait your reply



Your loving Sister



Hajia Amina Abid

How's it hangin'??,







You may call me Mistress Fanny my little diamond girl in a sess pool of slime. I fully comprehend all you've said and so excited after reading your mail and I am utterly thrilled to be apart of your soon to be over life, hopes and lofty dreams.







Rest assured of the secrecy of this farcical escapade being kept as such.







I am 30 years old and the Co-Founder of an anonymous group and charity for women with Excessive Vaginal Discharge. We receive hundreds of thousands of USD every year from all over the world. We run anonymous group support units all over the States and parts of Europe. You'd be surprised how many sufferers there are out there and how many wish to aid us in our plight and fight for Normal Vaginal Discharge.







The company has made me and my co founder very rich, which was our intent all along and ofcourse to meet women because in my spare time I'm a Lesbian Dominatrix and proud of it. I only use my Dominatrix skills on women. I noticed you said, "we can go into life partnership, or to have me as one of your family", in your email and as I'm lonely at the moment and without a lover for so long I pray you hope to be my life partner. I will do everything in my power to get here to my Dungeon Of Pleasure and show you the way Lesbian Bondage Heaven. I'm attaching a pic of myself. Hope it turns you on.



--



Please reply with baited breath.







Fanny Plunge







Co-Founder







Excessive Vaginal Discharge Anonymous

Assalamakuim Mistress Fanny Plunge,







Thank you for the mail, and your picture you send to me and your assurance to handle the money well as we agreed.







Based on your wish for me to recruit members for you here in my community, i will definitely do it for you even though am sick, i will try very best to consult at my own ability on the issue , we shall start from there , i love you and i want you to love me too , so that our wish and faith will come to pass.







Thank you for the address in new york and phone number you send the phone number should one put american code before getting across, because it start with +44 like UK number.







i will send to you the certificate of deposit slip now and also the contact of the security company in germany were you will travel to claim the deposit fund on behalf soon .







You will travel to germany where the consignments is deposited and disloged to your account ,My late husband deposited consignments money as jeweries to avoid trace , the security company doens't know that the contents is dollars and you should not tell them please.







Attached is the certificate of deposit slip ,The legal power of attorney will be processed on your behalf through an attorney , which will empower you to claim the consignments on my behalf.







You will be there in Germany just for 24 hours , and disloged the money to your account , i will give the security company your full informations soon,for you to take the delivery of the deposit consignments money .







Pls on no account will you let them know that the contents is dollars  because they dont know about it and you should not tell them .







Below is the contact of the security company.



PARAMOUNT - WEB SECURITY COMPANY (GER) Berlin



Tel-nr  00491-701762574.



Director of Operations / Mr Douglas Christopher



E-mail address [email protected]/*  */







Contact them either by email or phone and arrange the date of your arrival with them , Pls you have to hurry up in time , because the consignments has been accumulating demurrages there ever since my late husband deposited it there ,The certificate deposit slip is attached to you ,the power of attorney which will empower you to claim the consignments will come from a lawyer here .







On your readiness to travel or your husband as you said  i will send to you, the legal power of attorney which will empower you to claim the deposit fund on my behalf soon.







May Allah  bless you, i love you and you will be my love ever .



Your Loving Sister



Hajia Amina Abid

messages.subject: Re: i love you Fanny Reply
messages.body:
Hi my bitchface,







I will contact the company as soon as I've finished this mail.







While I'm dealing with them you can set the group for us there. The sooner you set the group in motion the quicker I can get you the donation. So lets work together and for each other my petal pie gimp.







When I'm finished everything I will come visit you. Don't worry about demurrages my darling. My foundation is funded by some very wealthy people and what I say goes with no questions asked. Any charges incurred I can handle. I think it is no mistake we have found each other. It's like my prayers have been answered.







As for my phone. It is an English company I use as I travel to Europe a lot and they save me $1,000's on mobile phone roaming charges. The prices in the States are absolutely daylight robbery.







I have told Diane Farpusies, my co-founder, about how you will be setting up a new group for us and she is very excited. We have no groups where you are, you see.














The requirements are very simple. Each group we start up is funded by our investors by photographic evidence. I am attaching a pic of the leader of our New York group. I wired her $20, 000 USD two months ago and since then she has built her group up to 36 women already. I hope you may have the same success.







All you will need to do is send me at least 3 pics with the same criteria. You will need to have a pic taken of each woman or a group photo with each person holding a piece of paper with this code sentence on it:














I will also need bank details of some sort from you as we cannot mail checks. The reason we need pics for this to work is the secret behind our success. Please my gimp this is a big secret and needs to remain so.







Most of the women in our groups are perfectly healthy. We get our funding and money from rich men and women that love to donate to charity. In order to keep their donations up we need a steady flow of new apllication pics to show them and starting new groups is the only way to do this. When we start a new group we get 50,000 USD from our accountants and send 20,000 to the founder which is you.







So now you know my secret and please realise







the more pics you send us the better for all in question.



--



Please reply with baited breath.







Fanny Plunge







Co-Founder







Excessive Vaginal Discharge Anonymous

Am still struggling to recruit people for the last picture group ,but it is not easy for me , i will not relent until i accomplish it ok.

I love you sister , i really want to see you ,after which you must have secure the consignment money in germany , i wish the lawyer will understand my predicaments and accepts my pleas.

Take care , sister fannyYour Love

i wish to inform you that i was able to collect the document power of attorney from the lawyer after along period of time, after series of pleading , considering my pericadiments, he decided to give it to me on trust, but one condition requesting for your information which i gave him, he equally gave me his full informations as well , which i am indicating to you now to contact him if you wish, Barrister Jerry Hawaa Email [email protected]/*  */ tel(002550177301,fax( 00252161005), he persist that he will like to reach to know when he will be paid the balance, as you can see ,if you check the date it was done on 14th of september , all you need to do now is to forward it to the security company in germany  i do hope you have the certificate which i have send to you before.







Am still preceding to complete the other task in recriuting the group pictures as we planned , which i will send to you soon.







contact the security company immediately and start on how to commence to move to germany soon, time is of essence .







I love you , and i wish our love will be more cordial if you will appear here as you indicated  and we see each other soon after which you must concluded, and transfer the money into your account from germany.







Stay Cool and have a blissful weekend , greet your friend for me.



Your Sister



Amina Abid
